import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import './style.css' const Temp = () => { const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState("pune"); const getWeather = async()=>{ try{ let url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${searchValue}&appid=479a7b690583815022ddc7c7a046ce0a`; let res= await fetch(url); let data= await res.json(); console.log(data) } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }; useEffect(()=>{ getWeather() },[]); return ( <>
setSearchValue(e.target.value) }/>
{/* temp card */}
25.5 °
sunny
Pune, In
{new Date().toLocaleString("en-US")}
{/* bottom 4 section */}

19:19 pm

Rain

19:19 pm
Humidity

19:19 pm

) } export default Temp
